title: Development cess at 7% of the Land Rate for the BUA as per ASR (for FSI 1) of the year of approval for the BUA beyond Zonal (basic) FSI (excluding fungible compensatory area) shall be paid to MCGM
clause_text: Development cess at 7% of the Land Rate for the BUA as per ASR (for FSI 1) of the year of approval for the BUA beyond Zonal (basic) FSI (excluding fungible compensatory area) shall be paid to MCGM. Development cess shall be in addition to development charges levied as per section 124 of MR&TP Act 1966.
section: 33(4) Building of Residential Hotels on independent plot:
